name: Dungeon Breakout (MohamedWael_GD, Khaled-Waled)
description:
"I have been prisoned here for a long time. After they caught me on the long-way street, I saw many deaths, and people suffers from those criminals. I can't handle this anymore and I have to get away from this place."

A survival platformer game where you have to make sure you don't get caught by criminals in a dungeon and avoid lights as much as you can, or it will be very bad.

Controls:

Move Left [A, Left Arrow]

Move Right [D, Right Arrow]

Jump [W, Up Arrow]

Interact [E]

Made By Mohamed Wael & Khaled Waled
